price: ߦߊ߯ߟߴߊ߬ߟߎ߫ ߣߊ߬ ߢߐ߲߮ ߡߊߛߙߊ߬ ߟߴߏ߬ ߟߋ ߟߊ߫ ߓߊ߬؟، ߍ߲߬ߍ߲߫ ߸ ߡߌ߬ߙߌ߲߬ߘߌ߫ ߘߊ߲߬ߠߊߕߊ߬ߡߌ߲߬ߣߍ߲ ߠߎ߫ ߟߋ߬ ߘߐߙߐ߲߫ ߦߋ߫
arabic: أَتَوَاصَوۡاْ بِهِۦۚ بَلۡ هُمۡ قَوۡمٞ طَاغُونَ

version.title: N'ko translation - Baba Mamadi
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the N'ko language, translated by Karamo / Baba Mamadi Jani.

meta.transliteration: atawāṣaw bihi bal hum qawmun ṭāghūna
translations: Have they transmitted it to them
Have they transmitted it to them
